meditation.title: Meditation Guide
meditation.subtitle: Purple Spark Meditation Flow
meditation.step1Desc: Adjust posture, phone on silent, set an intention.
meditation.step3Desc: From soles of feet to head, relaxation.
meditation.step4Desc: The "purple spark" comes alive in the heart center; gently illuminates its space with each breath.
meditation.step5Desc: "I'm sorry, please forgive me, thank you, I love you." (silently or in a whisper).
meditation.step6Desc: Anchor the spark in the heart, imagine a strong connection extending from roots to the world; drink water and take a short note.
